DTech Me Princess is a transformational merchandise experience where Guests ages 3-12 can have their 3D image scanned and captured in a Disney Princess Figurine.  This new interactive experience will allow Guests to live out their Princess dreams by placing their likeness on a three-dimensional 7-inch Disney Princess figurine keepsake!  

During this 10-minute experience, several cameras will instantly capture multiple angles of a Guest's face, which are reconstructed in a computer for processing into each Disney Princess figurine.  The "Princess-in-Waiting" can choose to place their faces onto one of seven different Disney Princesses, including: Ariel, Aurora, Belle, Cinderella, Rapunzel, Snow White, and Tiana. Hair, skin, and eye color of the figurine are customized to match the Guest.  A Princess silver link necklace with choice of colored gem charm is also included for participants. 

Click here for additional FAQ information.

See Images and Files on the left to view the figurines and necklace.

Your Disney PhotoPass photographer will make sure your photo shoot is catered to your needs while using their creativity and personal style to take unique photos that document your celebration.

Q. Which Airline will I be flying with?

A.All flights booked with Openride Limited, the flight-inclusive holiday provider for Walt Disney Travel Company, are currently with Virgin Atlantic.

Q. Are flights affected by the additional security checks at the airport?

A.All flights are operating to the normal 'on time' performance levels and no major delays are expected.

Q. What time is flight check-in?

A.For all long-haul destinations - we advise to check-in 3 hours prior to departure. If you check in on-line with Virgin Atlantic this is reduced to 2 hours prior to departure.

Q. In the UK, which terminal does Virgin Atlantic fly from?

A.For Virgin Atlantic flights - London Gatwick is South terminal; London Heathrow is Terminal 3 and Manchester is Terminal 2.

Q. I want to know more about Twilight Check-In where I can check-in for my flight the night before departure!

A.If you are flying with Virgin Atlantic from London Gatwick, you can take advantage of theTwilight Check In service"

Advance Passenger Information (API)

The United Kingdom requires airlines to provide certain passenger details prior to travel, through a security program called Advance Passenger Information System (APIS). This is similar to the Secure Flight program administered by the Transportation Security Administration (TSA) in the United States (see above). Guests who book flights through WDTC-UK are required to furnish API details prior to travel, including full name, date of birth, gender, and passport number/expiration date and country of issuance. Non-U.S. citizens are also required to provide the address of their first night's stay in the United States. API is entered on the airline's website by the passenger and must be completed every time the individual travels to the United States.

Guests can complete their APIS information via the airlines website 'Manage my booking' area. Depending on the airline this area may not be open to guests until their tickets are issued (30 days prior). As long as the guests confirm this information prior to travel they can do this even the day before when they are checking in online.

When booking an air-inclusive package, you must advise the guest:

"Prior to travel, you must provide your API (Advance Passenger Information) on your airline's website."

Word Choices: Using features and benefits to promote onsite hotel and ticket package bookings If a U.K. guest requests an offsite hotel or a room-only reservation, try these word choices to encourage them to stay onsite and purchase tickets in advance:

  • Transportation "The hotel you've requested is a very nice place to stay, but there may be availability near the same price range at one of our beautiful Walt Disney World resorts. Staying onsite will put you in the middle of the magic - you'll have access to complimentary transportation throughout our property, and Disney's Magical Express will even transport you to and from the airport! You'll save time and money, and never be lost or left wondering how to get where you want to go. Would you like me to check availability with us a well?"
  • Pools "One of the most popular features of a Walt Disney World resort is the pool. You can relax in the wonderful Florida sun and swim in the crystal clear waters of a pool that has been uniquely themed to delight your entire family."
  • Dining "Your options for dining within the Walt Disney World Resort are endless. Not only can you 'dine around the world' at Epcot, you can experience delicious and fun restaurants throughout all of our theme parks and at the resort you choose. And remember, Disney transportation will see that you get where you want to go."

The Education Team at Disney's Animal Kingdom Theme Park invites you to find out what happens behind-the-scenes at an incredible "New Species of Theme Park!" at Walt Disney World Resort.

 

During this in-depth 3-hour program you'll get an insider's look at the innovative ways that we are meeting challenges in areas such as conservation, animal nutrition and medicine, animal care and behavioral studies.

 

Highlights include visits to:

  • Backstage animal housing areas to meet some of our keepers and learn how we care for our animals on a daily basis
  • The Animal Nutrition Center, where all of our animal's diets are prepared
  • Our state-of-the-art Veterinary Hospital
  • Animal Programs Administration to learn how we are constantly seeking new ways to ensure our animal's health and well being

The majority of this program takes place behind the scenes and Animal viewing is extremely limited. The program includes a ride on the Kilimanjaro Safari attraction. Guests traveling in wheelchairs and ECVs can be accommodated.

See, Do, Learn, Grow!

Visit 4 greenhouses and a fish farm to catch a glimpse of amazing plants, insects and fish.
Like the "Living with the Land" attraction at Epcot? Then you'll love Behind the Seeds! This one-hour tour of the fish farm and 4 greenhouses that make up The Land Pavilion is perfect for anyone with an interest in gardening or natural sciences.

Tour Highlights include:

Visit the fish farm and see what it's like during feeding time.
Behold gigantic fruits and vegetables and unusual crops from around the world.
Discover the latest plant-growing techniques, including hydroponicslook, Ma, no soil!
Take home a handout with some great ideas for your own garden.

Make the most of your trip to the Walt Disney World Resort and enjoy Bass fishing at it's finest all year round. Journey out on Bay Lake and Seven Seas Lagoon, skim the shoreline of Village Lake, make way on Crescent Lake, or World Showcase lagoon.

Bass Nitro Fishing is a guided fishing excursion in a tournament style Nitro Bass boat on the waterways of Walt Disney World Resort.

Coronado Springs and Caribbean Beach will offer only artificial bait so that the waters of these lake systems will remain pristine.

 

Rods & Reels: 6 or 7 foot Abu Garcia medium action rods & Abu Garcia open-faced spinning reels.
Fishing Line: 10-12 pound Triple Fish test line.
Tackle: We use many different types of tackle. We typically will use crankbaits, rat-1-traps, spinnerbaits, soft jerk baits, bass assassins, poppers, rubber worms and rubber lizards during the cooler months. During the warmer months we use mostly rubber worms.
Live Bait: Shiners

 

Includes: Fishing equipment, rod, reel, artificial bait, shiners, and Non-alcoholic beverages for refreshments (no snacks available). Guests (1 per excursion) will receive a 1 Year membership to BASS (Bass Anglers Sportsman Society) which includes 11 issues of Bassmaster Guests (1 per excursion).

Commission for Aviation Regulation (CAR)

WDTC-UK is licensed as a travel agent in the Republic of Ireland by the Commission for Aviation Regulation (CAR) and provides this entity with an approved bond for the financial security of the funds paid to us by Guests.


In the event of a CAR-holder's failure, the CAR program ensures that consumers who paid and contracted with the CAR-holder for a flight-inclusive holiday package do not lose the money they have paid and are not stranded abroad. However, CAR is not the same as and does not replace a personal travel insurance policy; CAR only provides protection against the financial failure of the travel provider.


Packages that include flights are CAR-bond protected. If a holiday booking does not include air travel, this financial protection does not apply.
When recapping a reservation and confirming the total price, WDTC-UK agents must advise:
"The total price of your Walt Disney World holiday reservation is _____, and this includes CAR protection."

This protection is very similar to ATOL that covers U.K. Guests, but the license is known as "CAR" in Ireland.

What Does the Travel Protection Plan Offer?

  • Helps provide coverage for Guests for unexpected covered events from the moment theystep out their front door until the moment they safely arrive back home.
  • In the event a Guest must cancel or interrupt a trip for a covered reason, they are eligible to file claim(s) under the Travel Protection plan for prepaid, non-refundable trip costs
  • Provides coverage up to 7 days prior to arrival and up to 7 days after departure from their Disney vacation to allow for travel time.
    • Please note:
      • Multiple WDTC reservations must be consecutive to be covered under one plan purchase
      • Each traveler on the booking needs to purchase the plan to have coverage (meaning, one person can't purchase the plan and expect to have coverage for the entire booking)
      • If a traveler goes on a Disney Cruise (or any other "trip") in between 2 WDTC reservations, they will need to purchase two plans. Meaning, if they return after their cruise (or any other "trip") for a "room only" reservation, and it falls within 14 days post-WDTC package, the room would be covered as part of the original WDTC package.
  • Helps safeguard their trip payment at the following plan costs:
    • $82.50per adult
    • $6.00per child 17 and under including infants
  • Benefits are provided on a per person basis
  • In general, the plan cost is refundable within 14 days of purchaseprovided they have not departed on their trip or filed a claim. Note: other states may have different time requirements.

Experience the Stories of Our Gardens

Join our Disney Horticulture experts for inside looks at some of the most elaborate landscaping operations on Earth! Our Gardens of the World tours are perfect for plant lovers of all varieties, whether you're an avid gardener or simply an admirer of the beautiful flowers across Walt Disney World Resort.


During these fascinating journeys, Epcot becomes your "living classroom!" Witness firsthand how garden beds, shrubs, hedges and topiaries are meticulously cultivated at our seasonal festivals to evoke a sense of wonder. Imagination is only the first step in a complex process that results in these extraordinary botanical backdrops!


Travel around the World Showcase where you'll learn how the Disney Horticulture team tells elaborate stories through landscaping. And examine how the carefully planned designs play a crucial role in staying authentic and true to the diverse cultures of the 11 World Showcase Pavilions.


Plus, in addition to dazzling visuals, you'll even get to take some of the magic with you as our experts share gardening methods you can use back home!

Wild Africa Trek is an immersive experience that offers Disney's Animal Kingdom Guests a unique opportunity to enjoy areas of the Harambe Reserve and have an "up close and personal" experience with intriguing African wildlife species.

 

This three-hour experience led by specially trained guides begins in the Pangani Forest Exploration Trail where Guests can discover birds, fish, magnificent groups of gorillas, an under-water hippo viewing area and more. The journey continues along the edge of a magnificent, wide-open African savannah, where Guests board a specialized vehicle to enjoy an exclusive safari, including a stop at a private safari camp. This 30-minute respite allows Guests to continue premium animal viewing and enjoy African-inspired cuisine.

 

It's a way to experience the exclusivity and thrills of a safari adventure right in the heart of Disney's Animal Kingdom.

 

A portion of the Tour price will be donated to the Disney Conservation Fund.

A two hour birthday celebration at the Never Land Club (themed after the Disney Classic Peter Pan) includes pizza and apple juice for the children, full use of the Never Land Club for two hours, (2) 30-minute character visits with the character of your choice (from the list below based on theme selection), theme-specific decorations and goody bags for all children in attendance.
 

PACKAGE:

PREMIUM PACKAGE

  • CHARACTER of your choice (see below) for 1 hour (broken up in two (2) thirty minute sets).  Characters require a minimum 1 week advance notice.
  • 2 hour use of Never Land Club facilities
  • Choose from 3 Party themes (see below) for decorations
  • Birthday Cake
  • Pizza for the children, ordered as 2 slices per child, Cheese or Pepperoni available. 
  • Apple Juice for the children
  • Party Activities, games and crafts
  • Goody Bags and Balloons

 

THEMES:
Each Guest should choose (1) Party THEME from below:

  • Princess
  • Pirates
  • Mickey

 

CHARACTERS:
Characters are included in the PREMIUM Package ONLY. Character will have (2) 30 minute sets with a break in between.  Characters require a minimum 1 week advance notice.  Guest selects one of the Characters below by the THEME of the party (see THEME):

  • Princess Theme- Belle, Cinderella, Sleeping Beauty, Jasmine, Mulan or Snow White
  • Pirates Theme- Captain Hook, Mr. Smee, Peter Pan, Wendy, Mickey Mouse, or Minnie Mouse
  • Mickey Theme- Mickey Mouse, Minnie Mouse, Goofy, Pluto, Donald Duck, or Daisy Duck

Through research, WDTC has discovered that there are several airlines that accept the Sabre record locator on their web sites for check-in, printing boarding passes and other optional services.

If the Guest contacts the airline via telephone, the airline record locator will need to be provided

The following airlines accept the Sabre record locator on their web sites: Do not contact SD266(Air Help) for record locators on these airlines

  • American Airlines
  • Delta Air Lines
  • United Airlines
  • Virgin America

 

When a guest/travel agent calls with a request for the record locator, display the SBC reservation, scroll to the reservation summary, then air. You will see the column labeled PNR.

DO NOT quote the "SAB", only quote the 6 characters after the "SAB"

Once the airline tickets have been issued, usually within 24 hours of air payment, CTIS will see this entry in Notes:

********US PNR BDE7JW******** 02/05/13 22:13:58 ISO

CTIS may advise the guest of the airline record locator for all WDTC airlines

If you are experiencing difficulty identifying this entry in Notes, please contact your leader or contact SD266(Air Help)

This 4 hour walking tour will immerse Guests into the details and stories told throughout the lands, attractions and interactive experiences of the Magic Kingdom.  As Guests travel through the Magic Kingdom, they will enjoy interactive experiences and discover details carefully placed by Disney Imagineers that bring well-known stories to life, as well as a few surprising stories.  This tour is available to Guests ages 12 and up.

Before Cast Members can use the Movie Listing feature of the Cast Portal; Cast Members must add the Module to their Cast Portal settings.

  2. Log into the Cast Portal.

  3. Select the Work tab of the Cast Portal.

  4. In the Quick Access Panel click the link to Add Module.

  5. In the left column find the section titled Common Portal Features

  6. Scroll down till you find Movie Listings option and check the box.

  7. Scroll to the bottom of the page and click the Update button.

  8. Once the page has refreshed, scroll to the bottom of the page and find the Movie Listings module.

  9. Click the EDIT button.

  10. Enter "32830" into the Zip code: box and click the Search Button.

  11. Select AMC Pleasure Island 24 by clicking on it in the list.

  12. Click the ADD>> button to move it to the window on the right.

  13. Now click the Finished button to save your selections.

  14. You will now be able to select Movies Listings from the Quick Links section of the Cast Portal when you are logged in, or use the Movie Listings link on the AMC Pleasure Island 24 Detail page.

AAA Vacations andAAA Magic Moments Packages

Eligibility:

  • AAA or CAA Members must book through their AAA (American Automobile Association) or CAA (Canadian Automobile Association) Travel Agency. It is the responsibility of the Travel Agent to determine the Guest's eligibility to book this package.

Validation:

  • The AAA or CAA Member must show their Membership Card during check in at the Front Desk.

Reservation Agent Notes:

  • Reservation Agent must validate the AAA or CAA office and enter the Agency's information in Siebel. This is the only way SBC will provide access to these packages.
  • Reservation Agents may proactively offer AAA Magic Moments packages to qualitified AAA or CAA Travel Agents.
  • AAA Magic Moments packages should be offered first, provided there is availability. If there is no availability on a AAA Magic Moments package, Reservation Agents may book a non-discounted AAA Vacations Package instead.
  • If a AAA Vacations Package is not available, Reservation Agents may book a discounted room-only package.

Governing Law

  • All sales of packages take place in and are consummated in the State of Florida. Any claim, action or lawsuit (collectively, "Action") arising out of these Terms and Conditions, reservations and bookings, and/or all packages, products and services provided in connection with the reservations and bookings, including without limitation, components such as tickets, park admissions, packages, photo media, radio frequency devices and room accommodations (all collectively, "Terms, Reservations and Products") must be filed and maintained exclusively in any court in Orange County, Florida having subject matter jurisdiction. These Terms, Reservations and Products shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of Florida, without giving effect to any principles of conflicts of law.
